# braintrustdata_environment_variables (Data Source)

Lists Braintrust environment variables for an object. Optionally filter by exact `name`.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# List environment variables for a project
data "braintrustdata_environment_variables" "all" {
  object_type = "project"
  object_id   = "project-123"
}

# Optional exact-name filter after retrieval
data "braintrustdata_environment_variables" "filtered" {
  object_type = "project"
  object_id   = "project-123"
  name        = "OPENAI_API_KEY"
}

output "environment_variable_ids" {
  value = data.braintrustdata_environment_variables.all.ids
}

output "filtered_environment_variables" {
  value = data.braintrustdata_environment_variables.filtered.environment_variables
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `object_id` (String) The object ID that owns the environment variables.
- `object_type` (String) The object type that owns the environment variables (for example `project` or `function`).

### Optional

- `ending_before` (String) Optional pagination cursor to fetch environment variables before this ID.
- `limit` (Number) Optional max number of environment variables to return.
- `name` (String) Optional exact-name filter applied after retrieval.
- `starting_after` (String) Optional pagination cursor to fetch environment variables after this ID.

### Read-Only

- `environment_variables` (Attributes List) List of environment variables. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--environment_variables))
- `ids` (List of String) List of returned environment variable IDs.

<a id="nestedatt--environment_variables"></a>
### Nested Schema for `environment_variables`

Read-Only:

- `created` (String) The timestamp when the environment variable was created.
- `description` (String) Optional description associated with the environment variable.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the environment variable.
- `name` (String) The environment variable name.
- `object_id` (String) The owning object ID for this environment variable.
- `object_type` (String) The object type that owns this environment variable.
